mapper.select: select id, post_content, post_title, created_date, updated_date, member_id from tbl_post order by id desc limit 6 offset 0
select id, today_message_content, counselor_id from tbl_today_message order by id desc limit 12 offset 0
select id, notice_title, notice_content from tbl_notice order by id desc limit 7 offset 0

select count(*) from tbl_member m join tbl_post p on m.id = p.member_id and post_status = 'active'
and ( p.post_title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or p.post_content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or m.member_name like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') )
